690700.name: The Initiate Soundtrack
690700.description:
Experience the mysterious horror inspired soundtrack for The Initiate. Featuring all tracks found in the game, and will be updated regularly to provide even more fantastic music and value.

Tracks are:

1) The Initiate Theme (2:00)
2) Bedroom Waltz (2:10)
3) Dark Passages (2:05)
4) Dimly Lit (2:08)
5) Wall Of Silence (2:03)
6) Labrynth (2:54)
7) Trapped Inside (2:35)
8) Keys To The Truth (2:45)
9) Basement Depth (2:12)
10) The Way Is Shut (2:02)
11) Ambience 1 Dark Passages Light (2:04)
12) Ambience 2 Dimly Lit Light (2:06)
13) Ambience 3 Wall Of Silence (2:54)
14) Ambience 3 Grand Silence (2:49)
15) Ambience 4 Labyrinth Light (2:02)
16) Ambience 5 Trapped Inside Light (2:01)
17) Ambience 6 Keys To The Truth Light (2:08)
18) Ambience 7 Basement Depths (2:05)
19) Theme 2 Living Room Waltz Ultra Light (2:47)
690700.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
